title: Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers | Science & Engineering Kit | Build 20 Models | Learn about Force, Load, Compression, Tension | Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner, Blue
descriptions:
Unleash your inner engineer with the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers kit! Winner of the prestigious Parents' Choice Gold Award, this kit in a stunning Blue color allows you to build 20 different models using 285 pieces. 

Perfect for intermediate skill levels, this kit teaches you about key concepts like force, load, compression, and tension through hands-on experimentation. Explore different structural elements like columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary structures. 

With a 36-page illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide, you'll dive into the world of mechanical physics and structural engineering. Learn about different force types like tension, compression, shear, and bending, and discover various bridge types including truss, arch, cantilever, rope, and suspension bridges. 

Get ready for a series of 20 exciting model-building experiments that will challenge your creativity and problem-solving skills. Take your knowledge to new heights with Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers!

Unleash your inner engineer with the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers kit! Winner of the prestigious Parents' Choice Gold Award, this science and engineering kit in a striking blue color allows you to build 20 different models using 285 pieces. 

Explore the fascinating concepts of force, load, compression, and tension as you construct columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary structures. Delve into the different types of forces such as tension, compression, shear, and bending while learning about various bridge designs like truss, arch, cantilever, rope, and suspension bridges.

Perfect for intermediate builders, this kit includes a 36-page illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide to help you through a series of 20 model-building experiments. Enhance your understanding of mechanical physics, structural engineering, and the strength and stability of structures while having a blast creating your own architectural marvels. Don't miss out on this educational and entertaining kit!

Perfect for intermediate skill levels, this kit is designed to teach mechanical physics, structural engineering, strength and stability of structures, and optimization for safety and cost. Get ready to embark on a journey of discovery and creativity with the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering kit in a stunning blue color. Let your imagination soar as you build, experiment, and learn with this exceptional kit!
